ModMetaData.name: ATR Frames Reforged - Android Tiers
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7xuCZqW.png[/img] [h1]Submod for LEGACY [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2917948202]Android Tiers Reforged - Standalone [ATR][/url][/h1] Designed for Rimworld 1.4 Mod Version V1.2 Plese consider rating this if you like it! It really helps out. [img]https://i.imgur.com/tE28cZ7.gif[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table] *Make sure there are no existing jobs, hediffs, or frames and (as always) employ [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2921585989]Mid-saver Saver[/url] to remove in the safest way possible.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/6o9HyTD.png[/img] This mod reworks a few existing frames for engineering consistency, tweaks the tech tree and unlock points, and adds a variety of extras.
Also includes code to ensure that the carrying capacity improvements from framework upgrades are applied to weight limits for all purposes including caravans.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Wh5EspM.png[/img] [b]Altered Frames:[/b] - Hydraulic (fixed carrying capacity bonus due to limitations of hydraulic actuators) - Refined (increased pawn beauty and flat social impact buff from looking nice) - Mobility (fixed movement speed bonus, again due to actual actuator functioning)
[b]Added Frames:[/b] - Alignment Frame (hauling frame ideal for trainable mechanical animals) - Thermal Pumped Frame (combat oriented upgrade to the Guardian Frame) - Martial Frame (combat durability enhanced upgrade to the Mobility Frame) - Advanced Alignment Frame (improved from above but spacer tech and much more expensive) - Advanced Hydraulic Frame (as above; same scope of improvements and tech/cost changes) - Noble Frame (more refined version of the Refined Frame with a focus on enhancing Nobility)
I am happy to add other unique frames if people want them.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Qp8JBtZ.png[/img] [h1]Recommended:[/h1] [list] [*]Works best with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2944347505]ATR Industrial Automatons[/url]! [*]Works best with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2962634958]ATR MUFF Reforged[/url]! [/list]
[h1]Compatibility:[/h1] [list] [*]No known incompatibilities.* [/list]
[u]The following mods are special cases:[/u] *EdB Prepare Carefully eventually breaks all custom pawns; but that's their problem. *Combat Extended does their own compatibility patches; this is fine if they're patched for ATR.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/lQRf9dG.png[/img] [b]Will this work with other older Android Tiers mods?[/b] [i]No, ATR uses specific ATR tagged versions of things, which it calls upon to work.[/i]
[b]Can this be patched to work with other versions of Android Tiers?[/b] [i]If you make a patch, I'll happily add it in. I have no intention of patching it myself though.[/i]
[b]Will you add the other localisations for other languages like ATR has?[/b] [i]As above, if you would like to provide a localisation, I'll happily add it in.[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/UN80Om5.png[/img] [h1]Language Translations[/h1] [list] [*]Russian language translation provided by Tkhakiro [/list] All translations are provided by the community in a voluntary capacity - I don't do them myself. Translations are not guaranteed to be up-to-date or to have errors fixed promptly. [h3]Want to submit a translation to your own language?[/h3] Go to the GitHub (linked below) and submit a pull request.
[h1]Links[/h1] The Repo for this mod can be found here: [url=https://github.com/MasterOfGrey/ATR-Extra-Frames/tree/Legacy-ATR][GitHub][/url] I hang out in the discord for the main Android Tiers Reforged mod: [url=https://discord.gg/udNCpbkABT][Discord][/url]
